channel.title: How can I change the 'next level at'?
channel.description:
Edit: Changed question. :P
I recently updated my stats to 136. Under the stat though, it still says next level at 14391160 (which I guess is the xp needed to get level 99) How can I change that so it corisponds to the xp needed for levels 100 -136? Thanks.

item.title: How can I change the 'next level at'?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

@zyle1992 - Thanks.

I didn’t want to make a new topic so i’ll just recycle this one with a similar question.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I change the 'next level at'?
